website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive but comfortable option for a gaming chair that can also serve as a regular piece of furniture.
pros: Can adjust to 5 different tilt positions
Has a sturdy steel frame with a cover made of microfiber
Sturdy and comfortable to sit in
cons: Not big enough to support larger people

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for long use due to lack of back support
customer_reviews.text: Cushion for your bottom is sort of thin. Wide enough but could be more cushiony. The part for your back lacks much support especially if you're talller than 5'5" or 5'6". Im a 223 pd 5'8" male & this is a joke lol would be perfect for a teenager or a shorter lighter individual. I want to send it back but for only $65 i might just keep it and try to use it sparingly to game when im bored. 2 stars for now might up to 3 once i determine if i'll utilize it.
customer_reviews.author: William K. Mangus

customer_reviews.title: These reclining floor sofa chairs are so awesome. My sis in law has a floor chair ...
customer_reviews.text: These reclining floor sofa chairs are so awesome. My sis in law has a floor chair from japan and this is comparable quality to her chair. We just love it
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat Woman

customer_reviews.title: Cush
customer_reviews.text: This a great chair. It's firm while being soft, easy to adjust and it holds adjustments. The seat cushion lifs you 6" from the foor. I use use it on my deck and in the living room. It looks and feels inviting. A dream chair! My dog loves it too so I'm ordering another one for her!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lafarge

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and she just turned 1. Forever crawls and lays down and sits in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mellimel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the floor and Playing with my Pup
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this when I was dealing with some mild lower back pain that would get triggered while I sat on the floor to play with my pup. After ordering the lazy gaming chair it allows me to sit on the floor in comfort and play with my pup. I wish they sold the product in a fuax leather option though. But it's cool; I'm happy with my purchase. Oh and I'm a 5'5 female, average build (size 8-10) and I find the seat pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tee 619

customer_reviews.title: but over all I enjoy this chair a lot
customer_reviews.text: The folded part of the chair has no padding. I have to put a pillow there to help my back, but over all I enjoy this chair a lot. I am a gamer and like to be on the floor sometimes and this chair helps.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I hope the ratchet inside lasts
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I hope the ratchet inside lasts! pretty good size and comfy, must mention it has a pretty strong chemical smell to it though,i sprayed it with febreze lol im 6'7 and I can sit in it comfortably. I put it on my bed and use it when I play video games to help posture
customer_reviews.author: Matthaios

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was the perfect gaming chair, but we were mistaken. We've only had it 4 months and it's already broken. The design is similar to an outdoor chaise, where you need to push the recliner all the way forward and then back to it's final position. Without it being used that often, it no longer stops at different reclining levels, it lays completely flat on the floor! Very dissatisfied with this product - don't make the mistake of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my dad for Father's Day and 4 months later it can no longer be moved back to the upright position. I guess it makes an OK mattress now. UPDATE: The company has issued me a full refund since it broke within the 6-month warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: kyrah

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I just run a hand vacuum over ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I just run a hand vacuum over it in the flat position to clean and it’s good as new. Very comfy even on hardwood floor. Easy to maneuver. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: material has a nice feel and look, adjustable positions provide good support. i like that it's lightweight so easily moved when needed. i'm petite so not sure how well it will work for larger frame. the bottom is a little hard after some use, but easily solved with a small pillow.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Pretty comfortable. Happy with purchase. EDIT: after using this very minimally, all the chairs are falling apart. VERY disappointing and will be calling the company and reporting them to BBB.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT, IF YOU ARE NOT SURE IF YOU"RE GONNA LIKE IT OR NOT.
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday present for my hubby, He didn't like it, since he is tall it wasn't comfortable either. I paid $15.99 for shipping & having hard time doing free returns, plus they want to charge 15% restocking fees. If you not sure please don't buy this product. very very unhappy with customer service. Didn't even use & waste money one the top of it. Totally ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our boat. They work well. We're tall adults, average build, and they fit us well. Very comfortable. The bottom has a thin mesh covering so there isn't anything that will scratch our gel coat, or your wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Ok Floor seat.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for a week now. Though I don't regret buying it, but you can not sit on it for too long. The cushion is just not thick enough to sustain you thru a movie length. After an half-an hour sit, the metal inside starts to push against your body. I am 172 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Samesh Braroo

customer_reviews.title: I is probably fine for a young
customer_reviews.text: have to shore it up with multiple pillows. sometimes I'm confortable and sometimes not. I'm an older person who really shouldn't be sitting in this. I is probably fine for a young body
customer_reviews.author: A. Pires

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Since I have bad back pain, I cannot meditate like regular folks, so this works very well for me. I can still sit up, but I have comfortable back support. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi L. Oatway

customer_reviews.title: You don't know what you're missing.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic floor chair / Zaisu. Comfortable with a good quality cover that is removable and washable. More support and cushioning that typical Japanese models. I'm 6 foot 190 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vanderhoeven

customer_reviews.title: ... the cushion on the seat get’s really flat after like 2months, hurts my butt
customer_reviews.text: The fabric collects dust and the cushion on the seat get’s really flat after like 2months, hurts my butt.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, adjustable, feels like decent quality. The fabric is soft and feels durable. I'm very pleased with this as a floor seat when doing crafts.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it in her dorm as a sitting spot to study and watchbTV. Its comfortable and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids, or skinny teens
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids, not so much for fat dudes like me....
customer_reviews.author: Ray Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this on a Thursday night and received it the following Saturday morning! It said it would take a week and only took 2 days. Fast delivery and great product. Me and my partner are both 5’10 and over 140 pounds and it is very comfortable for both of us! We use it when we are playing games it works great for that. Exactly what we expected and needed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey fritz

customer_reviews.title: Causes lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: The chair forces you to slouch and hurts your back. There is a large hole that you can fit a whole pillow in where the lower back rests. No matter what the position of the chair, you can only slouch. Front fabric is good, back fabric is very cheap and has constant static, picks up everything! This chair is going to be returned before anyone else gets a backache.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for ALL ages!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is GREAT! It even lays flat and easily slides under a twin size bed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and easy to store. Useful for when people come over to my dorm and need a place to sit
customer_reviews.author: AlphaKryptonyte

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality
customer_reviews.text: The area where your butt sits sinks in a little too much, would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: probably shouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: cool while it lasted but wore out after only a few months, slumped and uncomfortable now. wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We use this chair in our playroom. It's super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Strong Chemical Smell & Not the Most Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the strong chemical odor at all for this product, I've never quite encountered something like this before with other products. It's so strong that even being 3 feet away makes me feel ill. Hopefully airing it out for a few days will remove the smell or I will definitely be returning it. It's not the most comfortable either, others listed themselves as >6' tall and thought it was fine. I cannot imagine how that can feel comfortable as at 5' 4" 170lbs it feels very small for me.
customer_reviews.author: kulum

customer_reviews.title: GREAT floor chair
customer_reviews.text: Great floor chair. Its very comfortable and works really well in any spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena E.

customer_reviews.title: Chair was great when we first received it
customer_reviews.text: Chair was great when we first received it, but the zipper broke on one side without even trying to open it. There is no way to keep the cover closed. In addition, after sitting in it for a while, the bar toward the bottom of your back will start to dig in and bother.
customer_reviews.author: Marty S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but strong chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Good: These chairs are comfortable and simple to adjust incline. Bad: Opening the box released a pungent chemical odor. I hope this dissipates soon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Good floor chair
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted in a floor chair not too big not too small comfortable adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for watching movies on my TV in my room or gaming. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: ASPC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but lacks back support.
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be against a sofa or wall. Not very good support. Can set in for extended time. We use it to spend time with our pets.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bought it for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Love it, bought it for my husband, but all my kids use it the most. We like that it has different positions. My kids even take naps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I was afraid the quality was not going to be good but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: MeredethFlanders

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is a little flat after a few weeks of use but other than that a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Corley

customer_reviews.title: If it had more cushion on the pad, I will give it a 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is okay. It is sitting and not falling over, but the seat is not as comfortible as I like... A little too hard, not much cushion.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for 5 yo, but I fit in it (5'3). 5yo loves it.
customer_reviews.author: newb uke

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and flimsy. Will definitely return this junk!! Don’t waste your money. ZERO STARS!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Taylor

product_meta.title: LZ LEISURE ZONE Adjustable 5-Position Folding Floor Chair Lazy Sofa Cushion Gaming Chair
product_meta.description:
Merax is happy to introduce this floor chair to you! Made of microfiber and padded with thick and ample stuffing, features a sturdy metal frame, this product offers comfort and durability for you to use. 
This floor sofa is very handy and lightweight that you can move it to any place and also store it very easily . It can provide you a great support for reading, chatting, watching TV or playing games. You can adjust its back to 5 position that make you feel comfortable, including lay flat used as a seat cushion. 

Dimension: 
Overall dimension:47 ”L X (19-26)”W X 6.9" Thickness 
Seat dimension:26”L X 22.5”W 

Instructions: 
Lay flat on the ground with one hand on the seat bottom and pull up backrest which click into multiple back support position. Stop when comfortable position is reached. To fold flat, push back support all the way forward and then it will fold back to flat position. 

Notice: 
Manual measurement, there are some reasonable error 
Items may slightly different from photo in terms of color due to the lighting during photo shooting or the monitor's display. 
Return Policy:http://www.amazon.com/sp?&seller=AG5L3JJZ30XAY&tab=policies
feature_bullets: Suede and thick sponge make it comfortable and warm.thick cushion and strong back support, better support your body weight, rest assured when reclining on it.
The back 5 levels adjustment design, ergonomic design with highly adjustable backrest for you to find a perfect reclining position, to meet different sitting postures.
The inside is filled with sponge, full of elasticity, giving you a comfortable experience, perfect for living room, bedroom, dorm room, balcony, gaming room and outdoor space, etc.

It can be adjusted to be floor sofa, chaise lounge or sleepy bed for watching TV, palying games ,working on a laptop or taking a nap.This folding sofa is equipped with two independent throw pillows that can be pillowed on.
Lay down dimensions: L71.3" x W44.1"(You can fold it up when you don't need it, which saves space.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
